title: New: Elohim – She Talks Too Much
body:
**Elohim** (Hebrew for God) showcases a rather refreshing sound on her debut track, _She Talks Too Much_.

Whilst there’s no shortage of well produced, relatively easy listening synth-pop projects around at this moment in time, few demonstrate the level of songwriting ability found on Elohim’s debut. It’s perhaps the finest no frills attached pop-songwriting since Ryn Weaver exploded onto the scene. Check it out below.

Follow our [Spotify On Repeat playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a hand-picked selection of the current hottest tracks.
